lines.content: > ‚ÄúYour mind is for having ideas, _not_ holding them.‚Äù ‚Äì David Allen (source)
### Bee frees your mind of having to remember things you need to do. ###
## All you need to do is, ##
4. let it manage your tasks for you üòâ
to start the application through CLI, download the codebase and run `./gradlew run`.
CLI version for UI is available before `branch-Level-10` was merged.

A chatbot that takes care of your todo list and task tracking!
type `help` into the chatbot and you will receive the list of commands:
